sentences.english: Write an essay of about five hundred words.
sentences.chinese: 写一篇约500字的文章。

sentences.chinese: vater在德语中是“父亲”的意思。

detailed_translations.english: a single group of letters that are used together with a particular meaning
to use words that are carefully chosen in order to express something

sentences.chinese: 他们把家具往后挪以便练习舞蹈动作。

sentences.chinese: 这是我们本赛季最后一场比赛。

sentences.chinese: 这是什么意思？我让你一小时之前就要到的！

detailed_translations.english: the thing or idea that a word, expression, or sign represents

sentences.english: Students must complete the course.
sentences.chinese: 学生必须学完这门课程。

sentences.english: The building took two years to complete.
sentences.chinese: 这幢大楼花了两年时间才完工。

sentences.chinese: 她被判八年徒刑。

if a judge sentences someone who is guilty of a crime, they give them a punishment

sentences.chinese: 一本德英词典

sentences.chinese: 词典收列单词，语法书讲解语法规则。

sentences.english: I got a letter from Melanie today.
sentences.chinese: 今天我收到梅拉妮的一封信。

sentences.english: There are 26 letters in the English alphabet.
sentences.chinese: 英语字母表有26个字母。

sentences.chinese: 我从人事档案里查到了你的地址。

sentences.chinese: 最常见的错误就是把它们种得太深了。

sentences.chinese: 你觉得你可以在考试的时候犯错误，看一看这之前写的东西,能告诉我这些是什么，我也不知道。

sentences.chinese: 如果真的犯了错误，想一想可能的解决方法，这样你在跟别人说的时候就可以提出解决它的建议。

sentences.chinese: 她不懂英语。

sentences.chinese: 你真该听我的建议。

detailed_translations.english: an opinion you give someone about what they should do

sentences.chinese: 他不该这么自私。

sentences.english: Computer technology makes it possible for many people to work from home.

sentences.chinese: 如有可能我想避开交通高峰时间。

sentences.chinese: 只要有可能我就步行或者乘坐公共交通工具。

sentences.chinese: 我们正竭尽全力追捕杀人凶手。

sentences.chinese: 即使技术上可行，我们也没有钱去做。

sentences.chinese: 她给出了这个单词的法语发音。

sentences.chinese: 他的词汇量给老师们留下了深刻的印象。

sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦改变了我们的时空概念。

detailed_translations.english: to arrange that something should happen at a particular time

sentences.chinese: 她需要有个人给她出主意。

sentences.chinese: “一定要把文件放在安全的地方。”奥特利向他建议道。

sentences.chinese: 羞怯的微笑

sentences.chinese: 我十几岁时害羞得很。

sentences.chinese: 电话交谈

sentences.chinese: 儿童对成年人的谈话很快就会厌倦。

sentences.chinese: 他们用德语说了一会儿，好像对什么事有分歧。

sentences.chinese: 在这么喧闹的环境中进行谈话是不可能的。

sentences.chinese: “你旅途愉快吗？”他问道，试图找话谈。

sentences.chinese: 无论索菲娅怎么引他说话，他就是一声不吭。

sentences.chinese: 过了一会儿，话题就转到一个朋友即将举行的婚礼上去了。

sentences.chinese: 他们谈得很投入，很放松，脸上带着微笑。

sentences.chinese: 他从房间对面听得到零星的对话。

sentences.english: We need to get this finished as quickly as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须尽快完成此事。

sentences.english: Kids grow up so quickly these days.
sentences.chinese: 现在的孩子长得真快啊。

detailed_translations.english: fast

sentences.english: the study of the natural world
sentences.chinese: 对自然界的研究

sentences.english: an area of spectacular natural beauty
sentences.chinese: 自然风景秀丽的地区

sentences.chinese: 自然死亡

sentences.english: the need for natural light in offices
sentences.chinese: 办公室里需要自然光的照射

detailed_translations.english: existing in nature and not caused, made, or controlled by people

sentences.english: The zoo asked its visitors to suggest a name for the new baby panda.
sentences.chinese: 动物园请游客提建议，给刚出生的大熊猫起一个名字。

sentences.english: It has been suggested that the manager will resign if any more players are sold.
sentences.chinese: 有人提议，如果再有球员被出售，球队主教练就辞职。

detailed_translations.chinese: 提议，建议；启发；使人想起；显示；暗示
detailed_translations.english: to tell someone your ideas about what they should do, where they should go etc

sentences.english: Make sure you keep the key in a safe place.
sentences.chinese: 一定要把钥匙放在安全的地方。

sentences.chinese: 我这一天尽是在东奔西跑。

sentences.chinese: 那地方全是大叫大嚷的孩子们。

sentences.chinese: 他扬言要把那地方烧毁。

sentences.chinese: 她再也没回过事故发生的地点。

sentences.english: The theatre bar was our usual meeting place.
sentences.chinese: 这个剧院酒吧是我们见面的老地方。

sentences.english: We were living then in a place called Alberiga.
sentences.chinese: 那时候我们住在一个叫阿尔伯里格的地方。

sentences.english: The wall was quite damp in places (= in some places ) .
sentences.chinese: 墙上有几处很潮湿。

sentences.english: Did the accident happen at your place of work (= the place where you work ) ?
sentences.chinese: 事故是在你的工作地点发生的吗？

sentences.english: It took us ages to find a place to live.
sentences.chinese: 我们花了好长时间才找到一个住处。

detailed_translations.english: a space or area, for example a particular point on a surface or in a room, building, town, city etc

sentences.chinese: 他们的房子建在可以俯视大海的小山上。

sentences.english: A cart was making its way up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 一辆马车正在爬上山丘。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land that is higher than the land around it, like a mountain but smaller

sentences.english: Nearly 70 percent of the population still live in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 人口中差不多有70%仍住在乡村。

sentences.english: Most of the world’s population doesn’t get enough to eat.
sentences.chinese: 世界上大多数人都吃不饱。

detailed_translations.english: the number of people living in a particular area, country etc

sentences.english: a man with a wide experience of foreign affairs
sentences.chinese: 外交事务经验丰富的人

sentences.english: Our aim is to bring classical music to a wider audience.
sentences.chinese: 我们的目的是把古典音乐带给更多的听众。

sentences.chinese: 这本书售出了一百多万册。

sentences.english: I’ve got a million ideas.
sentences.chinese: 我主意多得很。

detailed_translations.english: the number 1,000,000
an extremely large number of people or things

sentences.english: a pretty little girl
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的小姑娘

sentences.english: Maria looks much prettier with her hair cut short.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚把头发剪短好看多了。

detailed_translations.english: a woman or child who is pretty has a nice attractive face

sentences.english: Natalie was prettier than her sister.
sentences.chinese: 纳塔莉比她姐姐漂亮。

sentences.english: You need that money more than I do.
sentences.chinese: 你比我更需要那笔钱。

sentences.english: There were more people there than I expected.
sentences.chinese: 那里的人比我预想的要多。

sentences.chinese: 如果价格超过60美元，我就不买了。

sentences.chinese: 她甚至比平时醒得更早。

sentences.english: Divorce is more common than it was a generation ago.
sentences.chinese: 现在离婚比上一代人常见了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比（用于形容词、副词的比较级之后）；除…外（用于other等之后）；与其…（用于 rather等之后）；一…就（用于 no sooner等之后）
detailed_translations.english: used when comparing two things, people, situations etc

sentences.english: We need to get help quickly!
sentences.chinese: 我们需要马上得到帮助！

sentences.english: It would be a good idea to get professional advice.
sentences.chinese: 征求专业人士的意见，这个主意很好。

sentences.english: You may be able to get a grant from the local authority.
sentences.chinese: 你也许可以从当地政府获得拨款。

sentences.english: He cleared his throat to get our attention.
sentences.chinese: 他清清嗓子来引起我们的注意。

sentences.english: What time will we get there?
sentences.chinese: 我们什么时候可以到那里？

sentences.english: We got to Paris that evening.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上我们到了巴黎。

sentences.english: She soon got bored with the job.
sentences.chinese: 她不久就厌倦了这份工作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 获得，得到；到达；变成，成为
detailed_translations.english: to obtain something by finding it, asking for it, or paying for it

sentences.english: Which way is north?
sentences.chinese: 哪边是北？

sentences.english: He lives in North Wales.
sentences.chinese: 他住在威尔士北部。

detailed_translations.english: the direction that is at the top of a map of the world, above the Equator. It is on the left if you are facing the rising sun
in the north or facing the north

sentences.english: Which way is south?
sentences.chinese: 哪面是南？

detailed_translations.english: the direction that is at the bottom of a map of the world, below the Equator. It is on the right if you are facing the rising sun.
towards the south
in the south, or facing the south

sentences.english: The route then heads west over Gerrick Moor.
sentences.chinese: 之后这条路折向西，穿过格里克漠泽。

sentences.english: the west door of the church
sentences.chinese: 教堂的西门

sentences.english: A damp wind blew from the west.
sentences.chinese: 从西面吹来一股潮湿的风。

sentences.english: a west-facing window
sentences.chinese: 朝西的窗户

detailed_translations.english: towards the west
in the west or facing the west
the direction towards which the sun goes down, and which is on the left if you are facing north

sentences.english: You can do this in your home town.
sentences.chinese: 在自己的家乡你就能做到这些。

sentences.english: Even if you've never been outside of your home town, say you've been anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 即使你从没有远离过你的家乡，你也可以说你到过的任何地方。

detailed_translations.english: the place where you were born and spent your childhood

sentences.english: I never liked long walks, especially in winter.
sentences.chinese: 我向来不喜欢长距离散步，尤其在冬天。

sentences.english: Art books are expensive to produce, especially if they contain colour illustrations.
sentences.chinese: 美术类书籍制作成本很高，尤其是那些带彩色插图的。

sentences.english: I was especially fond of chocolate biscuits.
sentences.chinese: 我特别爱吃巧克力饼干。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that something is more important or happens more with one particular thing than with others

sentences.english: This guy should be famous for scoring the first goal of the 2010 World Cup...
sentences.chinese: 这位哥们会因为打进了2010南非世界杯第一个进球而成名。。。。。。

sentences.english: This guy should be famous for scoring the first goal of the 2010 World Cup...but it's been overshadowed by the celebration.
sentences.chinese: 这位哥们会因为打进了2010南非世界杯第一个进球而成名。。。。。。但是他的光芒可能被进球庆祝夺走。

sentences.english: He teaches Esperanto at that university.
sentences.chinese: 他在那所大学教世界语。

sentences.english: She buddied up with a student from another university.
sentences.chinese: 她与来自另一大学的一名学生交朋友。

sentences.english: The student left the university to go out into the world and find himself.
sentences.chinese: 这个学生离开了大学进入社会去发现自己的才能所在。

detailed_translations.english: an educational institution at the highest level, where you study for a degree

sentences.english: I live on an island.
sentences.chinese: 我住在一个岛上。

sentences.english: Then one day, an English ship anchored near the island.
sentences.chinese: 然后有一天，一艘英国船在岛附近抛锚了。

sentences.english: This is because the island is so close to the equator. So you can choose to go whenever you like.
sentences.chinese: 就因为这个岛是如此接近赤道。所以只要你愿意你任何时候都可以去。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of land completely surrounded by water

sentences.english: Only cheeses made in this area may be labelled ‘Roquefort.’
sentences.chinese: 只有这个地区出产的干酪才能被称作“罗克福尔干酪”。

sentences.english: Crime rates are much higher in urban areas.
sentences.chinese: 城镇地区的犯罪率要高很多。

sentences.english: an area of 2,000 square miles
sentences.chinese: 2,000平方英里的面积

sentences.english: The course covers three main subject areas.
sentences.chinese: 这门课程涵盖三大学科领域。

detailed_translations.english: a particular part of a country, town etc

sentences.english: a low wall/building/table
sentences.chinese: 矮墙 / 建筑物 / 桌子

sentences.english: low clouds
sentences.chinese: 低云

sentences.english: jobs with low status
sentences.chinese: 社会地位低下的职业

detailed_translations.english: not high or tall

sentences.english: the highest mountain in Austria
sentences.chinese: 奥地利最高的山

sentences.english: the Rocky Mountains
sentences.chinese: 落基山脉

sentences.english: a steep mountain road
sentences.chinese: 陡峭的山路

sentences.english: magnificent mountain ranges
sentences.chinese: 雄伟的山脉

sentences.english: snow-capped mountain peaks
sentences.chinese: 白雪覆盖的山峰

sentences.english: a mountain rescue team
sentences.chinese: 山地营救队

sentences.english: She was the first British woman to climb the mountain .
sentences.chinese: 她是攀登这座山峰的第一位英国女子。

detailed_translations.english: a very high hill

sentences.english: The house had lovely views over open countryside .
sentences.chinese: 这房子望出去是开阔的乡村美景。

detailed_translations.chinese: 农村，乡下；乡下的全体居民
detailed_translations.english: land that is outside cities and towns

sentences.english: It started to rain, so Tricia stopped to put up her umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 开始下雨了，所以特里西娅停下来撑起雨伞。

sentences.english: I spent the day on the beach, lying under a beach umbrella, reading.
sentences.chinese: 那天我就在海滩上度过，躺在海滩遮阳伞下面看书。

detailed_translations.chinese: 雨伞；保护伞；庇护；伞形结构
detailed_translations.english: an object that you use to protect yourself against rain or hot sun. It consists of a circular folding frame covered in cloth.

sentences.english: Yes, I like basketball and baseball.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我喜欢篮球和棒球。

sentences.english: Do you like baseball?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢打棒球吗?。

sentences.english: That man over there used to be one of the best players in baseball .
sentences.chinese: 这句话的意思是：那边那个人以前是最好的棒球运动员之一。

detailed_translations.english: an outdoor game between two teams of nine players, in which players try to get points by hitting a ball and running around four  base s

sentences.english: I like playing beach volleyball.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢打沙滩排球。

sentences.english: Every sunday, they played volleyball in the park.
sentences.chinese: 每个周日他们在公园打排球。

sentences.english: Balloon, baseball, basketball, football and volleyball all dance  ballet on the  volcano.
sentences.chinese: 气球、棒球、篮球、足球和排球都在火山上跳芭蕾舞。

detailed_translations.english: a game in which two teams use their hands to hit a ball over a high net

sentences.english: Her husband is about the most boring person I’ve ever met.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫可以说是我见过的最无聊的人。

sentences.english: The job was dull and boring.
sentences.chinese: 这份工作枯燥乏味。

detailed_translations.chinese: 令人厌烦的， 乏味的， 无聊的
detailed_translations.english: not interesting in any way

name: exciting
trans: 令人激动的；使人兴奋的

sentences.english: an exciting discovery
sentences.chinese: 激动人心的发现

sentences.english: ‘Julia and Paul are getting married!’ ‘Oh, how exciting!’
sentences.chinese: “朱莉娅和保罗要结婚了！”“啊，太让人兴奋了！”

sentences.english: I’ve got some very exciting news for you.
sentences.chinese: 我给你带来了一些很激动人心的消息。

sentences.english: Let’s do something exciting.
sentences.chinese: 我们来做些让人振奋的事情吧。

sentences.english: Melanie finds her work exciting and rewarding.
sentences.chinese: 梅拉妮觉得自己的工作既刺激又有意义。

detailed_translations.english: making you feel excited

name: relaxing
trans: 令人愉悦的；使人放松的

sentences.english: a relaxing evening at home
sentences.chinese: 在家里度过的一个轻松的夜晚

detailed_translations.english: making you feel relaxed

sentences.english: At half-time the score was one all.
sentences.chinese: 半场时的比分是一比一。

sentences.english: What’s the score?
sentences.chinese: 比分是多少？

sentences.english: Is anybody keeping score (= making a record of the score ) ?
sentences.chinese: 有没有人负责记分？

sentences.english: The final score was Southampton two, Leeds United nil.
sentences.chinese: 最后的比分是二比零，南安普敦队击败利兹联队。

sentences.english: The school’s test scores have not improved.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校的考试成绩没有提高。

detailed_translations.english: the number of points that each team or player has won in a game or competition

sentences.english: ‘Lunch? ’ ‘No thanks, I've already eaten. ’
sentences.chinese: “午餐？”“不，谢谢，我已吃过了。”

sentences.english: We got there early but Mike had already left.
sentences.chinese: 我们及早到了那里，但是迈克已经离开了。

detailed_translations.english: before now or before a particular time in the pas

sentences.english: If I have to stay late at work tonight, it won’t matter because we can go out another night.
sentences.chinese: 如果今晚我必须工作到很晚的话，那也没关系，我们可以改天晚上再出去。

sentences.english: Does it matter what I think?
sentences.chinese: 我怎么想重要吗？

sentences.english: Do you think it matters that the cups and saucers don’t match?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得茶杯与杯托不相配要紧吗？

sentences.english: campaigning on issues that really matter
sentences.chinese: 以重大问题为竞选议题

sentences.english: Money was the only thing that mattered to him.
sentences.chinese: 对他来说，钱是唯一重要的东西。

sentences.english: I don’t care what it looks like – what matters is that it works.
sentences.chinese: 我不在乎外观——要紧的是它要管用。

sentences.english: At last she was with the man she loved and nothing else mattered .
sentences.chinese: 最终她和她所爱的男人在一起了，其他都无关紧要。

sentences.english: She said very little during the meal. Not that it mattered (= it was not important ) .
sentences.chinese: 她吃饭时话很少，那倒无所谓。

detailed_translations.english: to be important, especially to be important to you, or to have an effect on what happens

sentences.english: Was anyone hurt in the accident?
sentences.chinese: 事故中有人受伤吗？

sentences.english: Put that thing down - you might hurt someone with it.
sentences.chinese: 快把那东西放下，你会伤着别人的。

sentences.english: I didn’t mean to hurt your feelings.
sentences.chinese: 我不是故意要伤害你的感情。

detailed_translations.english: to injure yourself or someone else

sentences.english: Games can make learning more enjoyable.
sentences.chinese: 游戏可以寓教于乐。

sentences.english: an enjoyable experience
sentences.chinese: 令人愉快的经历

detailed_translations.chinese: 快乐的；有乐趣的；令人愉快的
detailed_translations.english: something enjoyable gives you pleasure

sentences.english: the new Olympic Stadium
sentences.chinese: 新的奥林匹克体育场

detailed_translations.chinese: 体育场；露天大型运动场
detailed_translations.english: a building for public events, especially sports and large rock music concerts, consisting of a playing field surrounded by rows of seats

sentences.english: I’d like to make an appointment with Miss Taylor.
sentences.chinese: 我想约一下泰勒小姐。

detailed_translations.english: used in front of the family name of a woman who is not married to address her politely, to write to her, or to talk about her

sentences.english: It is impossible to understand the complex nature of the human mind.
sentences.chinese: 要想了解人类思维复杂的特性是不可能的。

sentences.english: Mind and body are closely related.
sentences.chinese: 思想和肉体紧密相连。

sentences.english: Meditation involves focusing the mind on a single object or word.
sentences.chinese: 冥想需要把思想集中在一个物体或单词上。

sentences.english: Sorry─your name has gone right out of my mind.
sentences.chinese: 对不起——我完全想不起你的名字了。

detailed_translations.english: your thoughts or your ability to think, feel, and imagine things

sentences.english: There’s plenty to do and see in New York.
sentences.chinese: 在纽约有很多事可做，很多东西可看。

detailed_translations.english: a large quantity that is enough or more than enough

sentences.english: You have plenty of time to read.
sentences.chinese: 你有大量的时间读书。

sentences.english: The new collections of custom furs around town reveal plenty of folderol, but there are practical things too.
sentences.chinese: 市上大批新的定做的皮衣中有许多是华而不实的， 但也有一些实用的东西。

sentences.english: Somebody was beating at the door.
sentences.chinese: 有人在打门。

sentences.english: Brazil were beaten 2–1.
sentences.chinese: 巴西队以1比2告负。

sentences.english: Labour easily beat the Conservatives in the last election.
sentences.chinese: 工党在上一届选举中轻松击败保守党。

detailed_translations.english: to hit sb/sth many times, usually very hard

sentences.english: It was careless of him to leave the door unlocked.
sentences.chinese: 他忘了锁门，真是粗心大意。

sentences.english: a careless mistake
sentences.chinese: 粗心造成的错误

sentences.english: careless driving
sentences.chinese: 粗心驾驶

sentences.english: Careless talk can be disastrous for a business.
sentences.chinese: 谈话不慎有时会给企业带来灾难性的损失。

sentences.english: She gave a careless shrug.
sentences.chinese: 她漠然地耸了耸肩。

detailed_translations.english: not paying enough attention to what you are doing, so that you make mistakes, damage things etc

sentences.english: A thousand supporters packed into the stadium to cheer them on.
sentences.chinese: 1000名支持者涌进体育场为他们加油。

detailed_translations.english: When you cheer someone on, you shout loudly in order to encourage them, for example when they are taking part in a game

sentences.english: a tennis coach
sentences.chinese: 网球教练

sentences.english: the Norwegian national coach
sentences.chinese: 挪威国家队教练

detailed_translations.english: someone who trains a person or team in a sport

name: fan club
trans: 球迷（或影迷、歌迷）俱乐部

sentences.english: Our football fan club began to recruit new members last week.
sentences.chinese: 我们的足球球迷俱乐部上周开始招收新会员。

sentences.english: More than 150 items that had belonged to the former president of the Elvis Presley fan club went on the block at Chicago's Leslie Hindman auctioneers.
sentences.chinese: 共有150多件物品于当天在芝加哥的莱斯利•辛德曼拍卖行拍卖，这些物品原归“猫王”歌迷俱乐部的前会长所有。

sentences.english: It was a dream come true for the “Down Under Disneyana” fan club members, who have all been to one or more Disney parks before, but have never done them all at one go.
sentences.chinese: 对于“澳大利亚迪斯尼阿娜”爱好者俱乐部的成员来说，这是一次美梦成真的旅行。 这些成员以前都曾去过一个或者多个迪斯尼乐园，但都没有一次游遍所有迪斯尼乐园的经历。

detailed_translations.chinese: 球迷（或影迷、歌迷）俱乐部
detailed_translations.english: an organization for  fans  of a particular team, famous person etc

name: against
trans: （在比赛或战斗中）对（某人或某事物）

sentences.english: There was a ladder propped up against the wall.
sentences.chinese: 有一把梯子靠在墙边。

sentences.english: sailing against the wind
sentences.chinese: 逆风航行

detailed_translations.english: next to and touching an upright surface, especially for support

sentences.english: We went all the way to Inverness by train.
sentences.chinese: 我们一路坐火车到因弗内斯。

detailed_translations.english: a set of several carriages that are connected to each other and pulled along a railway line by an engine
to teach someone the skills of a particular job or activity, or to be taught these skills

sentences.english: religious beliefs and practices
sentences.chinese: 宗教信仰和习俗

sentences.english: dangerous working practices
sentences.chinese: 危险的工作方法

detailed_translations.english: something that people do often, especially a particular way of doing something or a social or religious custom

sentences.english: The house was lovely and warm.
sentences.chinese: 那房子漂亮温暖。

sentences.english: I hope we get some warm weather soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望天气很快就会回暖。

sentences.english: I’ve put your dinner in the oven to keep it warm.
sentences.chinese: 我把你的饭菜放进了烤箱里保温。

sentences.english: warm water
sentences.chinese: 温水

detailed_translations.english: slightly hot, especially in a pleasant way
to make someone or something warm or warmer, or to become warm or warmer

sentences.english: In an hour the drivers will be warming up for the main event.
sentences.chinese: 一小时后车手们要为主赛做热身运动。

detailed_translations.english: If you warm up for an event such as a race, you prepare yourself for it by doing exercises or by practicing just before it starts

sentences.english: Make a cheese sauce in the usual way.
sentences.chinese: 按通常的做法做奶酪酱。

sentences.english: I’ll meet you at the usual time.
sentences.chinese: 我在老时间和你碰头。

sentences.english: She ate twice as much as usual.
sentences.chinese: 她吃了平时食量两倍的东西。

detailed_translations.english: happening, done, or existing most of the time or in most situations

sentences.english: Your stereo is better than mine.
sentences.chinese: 你的音响比我的好。

sentences.english: There must be a better way to do this.
sentences.chinese: 一定还有更好的办法来做这件事。

sentences.english: He can speak French a lot better than I can.
sentences.chinese: 他法语讲得比我好多了。

detailed_translations.english: more useful, interesting, satisfactory, effective, suitable etc
to a higher standard or quality

sentences.english: ...an after-school programme for advanced students.
sentences.chinese: ...高年级学生课外活动计划。

detailed_translations.english: After-school activities are those that are organized for children in the afternoon or evening after they have finished school

sentences.english: Your Dad will be so pleased.
sentences.chinese: 你爸爸会非常高兴的。

sentences.english: She seemed pleased by the compliment.
sentences.chinese: 她受了赞扬，显得很高兴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 高兴的；喜欢的；乐意做某事
detailed_translations.english: happy or satisfied

detailed_translations.chinese: 满意；愿意（please的过去分词形式）

sentences.english: The crowd parted to let the truck pass.
sentences.chinese: 人群分开让卡车通过。

sentences.english: He gave me a smile as he passed.
sentences.chinese: 他经过时对我微笑了一下。

sentences.english: We passed a group of students outside the theatre.
sentences.chinese: 我们在戏院外从一群学生身旁经过。

sentences.english: I pass the sports centre on the way to work.
sentences.chinese: 我上班的路上经过体育中心。

sentences.english: The road passes right through the town centre.
sentences.chinese: 那条路正好穿过镇中心。

sentences.english: We passed the winter pleasantly enough.
sentences.chinese: 我们相当愉快地度过了那个冬季。

detailed_translations.english: to come up to a particular place, person, or object and go past them

sentences.english: It’s a great pity Joyce wasn’t invited.
sentences.chinese: 乔伊斯没有受到邀请太遗憾了。

sentences.english: I like Charlie. Pity he had to marry that awful woman.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢查利，遗憾的是他得和那个糟糕的女人结婚。

sentences.english: A pity we can’t find the guy who did it.
sentences.chinese: 真遗憾我们找不到那个干了这件事的家伙。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that you are disappointed about something and you wish things could happen differently

detailed_translations.chinese: 对……表示怜悯；对……感到同情
detailed_translations.english: to feel sorry for someone because they are in a very bad situation

sentences.english: If someone invited me over to Florida, I’d jump at the chance (= use the opportunity eagerly ) .
sentences.chinese: 如果有人邀请我去佛罗里达，我会赶紧抓住这个机会。

sentences.english: There’s always the chance that something will go wrong.
sentences.chinese: 总有可能会出现问题。

sentences.english: If we did move to London, I’d stand a much better chance (= have a much better chance ) of getting a job.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们真的搬到伦敦去，我找到工作的机会就大多了。

sentences.english: There is little chance of her being found alive.
sentences.chinese: 她生还的可能性很小。

detailed_translations.english: a time or situation which you can use to do something that you want to do

sentences.english: The audiences stamped loudly to express their grievances.
sentences.chinese: 听众大声地踏脚以表达他们的不满。

sentences.english: Despite her disability, Philippa is very confident.

sentences.chinese: 我要换上干衣服。

sentences.chinese: 肉最厚的部分从粉红色变成白色，就说明熟了。

detailed_translations.english: if something is thick, there is a large distance or a larger distance than usual between its two opposite surfaces or sides

sentences.english: I couldn’t go out with someone for a joke, could you?
sentences.chinese: 我可不能拿谈恋爱当儿戏，对不对？

sentences.english: I never joke about money.
sentences.chinese: 我从不拿钱开玩笑。

to say things that are intended to be funny and that you do not really mean

sentences.english: If you need more information, you might try the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 如果你需要更多的信息，可以试试因特网。

sentences.english: I thought we might go to the new Chinese restaurant on the High Street.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们可以到大街上新开的那家中国餐馆去。

sentences.english: It might be a good idea to put those plants in the shade.
sentences.chinese: 把那些植物放在阴凉处也许是个好主意。

sentences.english: We’re going to a concert. You might like to come with us.
sentences.chinese: 我们要去听音乐会，你也许想和我们一起去吧。

detailed_translations.english: if something might happen or might be true, there is a possibility that it may happen or may be true, but you are not at all certain

sentences.english: The temperature of the water was just right for swimming.
sentences.chinese: 这水温游泳正好。

sentences.english: Water boils at a temperature of 100˚C.
sentences.chinese: 水在100摄氏度沸腾。

sentences.english: The nurse took (= measured ) my temperature .
sentences.chinese: 护士给我量了体温。

detailed_translations.english: a measure of how hot or cold a place or thing is

sentences.english: The payment will be refunded to you minus a small service charge.
sentences.chinese: 这笔款项扣除一小笔服务费后将退还给你。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that one number or quantity is being  subtract ed  from another
something that is a disadvantage because it makes a situation unpleasant
used to talk about a disadvantage of a thing or situation

sentences.english: Newspapers vary in the degree to which they emphasize propaganda rather than information.
sentences.chinese: 报纸重宣传轻资讯的程度各不相同。

detailed_translations.english: the level or amount of something

sentences.english: Although in poor health, she continued to carry out her duties.
sentences.chinese: 尽管身体不好，她仍继续执行任务。

sentences.english: We decided to take rooms in Longwood House, although we knew we could not really afford the rent.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我们知道自己其实付不起租金，但还是决定住朗伍德庄园的房间。

sentences.english: Although I can’t help admiring the man’s courage, I do not approve of his methods.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我不得不佩服那个男子的勇气，却并不赞成他的方法。

detailed_translations.english: used to introduce a statement that makes your main statement seem surprising or unlikely

sentences.english: I’ve washed your shirt but it’s still wet.
sentences.chinese: 我把你的衬衫洗过了，不过现在还是湿的。

sentences.english: wet grass
sentences.chinese: 湿草地

sentences.english: The man in the boat was wet through (= completely wet ).
sentences.chinese: 船上的那人浑身湿透。

detailed_translations.english: covered in or full of water or another liquid
the rain
to make something wet

sentences.english: Neither Oleg’s mother nor his father spoke English.
sentences.chinese: 奥列格的父母都不会说英语。

sentences.english: The equipment is neither accurate nor safe.
sentences.chinese: 这台设备既不精确，也不安全。

detailed_translations.english: used when mentioning two things that are not true or possible
used to show that a negative statement is also true about another person or thing

sentences.english: The hotel was absolutely terrible.
sentences.chinese: 这家宾馆糟糕透了。

sentences.english: I’d better write this down; I have a terrible memory.
sentences.chinese: 我最好把它记下来，我的记性很差。

sentences.english: You’re making a terrible mistake.
sentences.chinese: 你犯了一个极大的错误。

detailed_translations.english: very bad

sentences.english: Close your eyes and make a wish.
sentences.chinese: 闭上眼睛许个愿。

detailed_translations.english: a desire to do something, to have something, or to have something happen
to want something to be true although you know it is either impossible or unlikely

sentences.english: It'll probably be OK.
sentences.chinese: 这大概没有问题。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that sth is likely to happen or to be true

sentences.english: Come on, darling, we'll be late.
sentences.chinese: 快点，亲爱的，我们要迟到了。

detailed_translations.english: You say `Come on' to someone to encourage them to hurry up

sentences.english: It’s 40 miles from here to the Polish border.
sentences.chinese: 从这里到波兰边界有40英里。

sentences.english: an area 50 miles wide and 150 miles long
sentences.chinese: 一片50英里宽、150英里长的地区

sentences.english: We walked about half a mile .
sentences.chinese: 我们大约走了半英里。

sentences.english: He was driving at 70 miles per hour .
sentences.chinese: 他正以每小时70英里的速度驾车行驶。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring distance, equal to 1,760  yard s  or about 1,609 metres

sentences.english: We sat round the table playing cards.
sentences.chinese: 我们围桌而坐玩纸牌。

sentences.english: Gather round! I have an important announcement to make.
sentences.chinese: 大家围拢来！我有重要事情要宣布。

sentences.english: He put his arm gently round her waist.
sentences.chinese: 他轻轻地搂着她的腰。

sentences.english: I kept the key on a chain round my neck.
sentences.chinese: 我给钥匙穿了根链子挂在脖子上。

sentences.english: The ballroom’s huge, with windows all the way round .
sentences.chinese: 舞厅很大，四周都是窗户。

sentences.english: There was a lovely courtyard with tables all round .
sentences.chinese: 有一个漂亮的庭院，四周都是桌子。

detailed_translations.english: surrounding or on all sides of something or someone

sentences.english: four miles to the northwest
sentences.chinese: 西北方向4英里

sentences.english: the northwest suburbs of the city
sentences.chinese: 城市西北部的郊区

detailed_translations.english: the direction that is exactly between north and west
in the northwest of a place

sentences.english: the southeast quarter of the city
sentences.chinese: 该市的东南部

sentences.english: I know we have to go southeast, more or less.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我们大概得往东南方向走。

detailed_translations.english: a southeast wind comes from the southeast
the direction that is exactly between south and east
If you go southeast, you travel toward the southeast

sentences.chinese: 教会的人时不时会到我的拖车上来，告诉我他们依然在为我祈祷，希望我不要在去往地狱的道路上越走越远，早日回到耶稣我主的身边。

sentences.english: Sometimes going over the top is good, if you can let yourself go from time to time, people will notice.
sentences.chinese: 有时挣脱束缚是好的，如果你能够让自己一次又一次地挣脱束缚，人们会注意到你的。

sentences.english: a baseball cap
sentences.chinese: 棒球帽

sentences.english: a bottle cap
sentences.chinese: 瓶盖

sentences.english: a graceful tower capped with a golden dome
sentences.chinese: 一座漂亮的金色圆顶塔

detailed_translations.english: a type of flat hat that has a curved part sticking out at the front, and is often worn as part of a uniform
to have a particular substance on top

sentences.english: They meet fairly often to play chess .
sentences.chinese: 他们经常在一起下国际象棋。

detailed_translations.english: a game for two players, who move their playing pieces according to particular rules across a special board to try to trap their opponent’s king

sentences.english: a chess set
sentences.chinese: 一副国际象棋

detailed_translations.english: a group of similar things that belong together or are related in some way

sentences.english: Hou's parents noticed her interest in a chess board at a store, they promptly bought her a chess set — and then hired a chess tutor for her.
sentences.chinese: 当侯逸凡的父母在一家商店发现了孩子对国际象棋的兴趣之后，他们立马给她买了一套，然后请了一位老师教她下棋。

sentences.english: When Ms. Hou’s parents noticed her interest in a chess board at a store, they promptly bought her a chess set — and then hired a chess tutor for her.
sentences.chinese: 当侯逸凡的父母在一家商店发现了孩子对国际象棋的兴趣之后，他们立马给她买了一套，然后请了一位老师教她下棋。

sentences.english: He received a chess set for his 13th birthday, and he quickly discovered that he was something of a prodigy, a fact he decided to hide so he wouldn’t get beaten up in the lunchroom.
sentences.chinese: 13岁生日时，收到一副国际象棋，他很快发现，他是象棋天才。 他决定将这一发现隐藏起来，以免在食堂被凑。

sentences.english: How well do you know your chopstick etiquette?
sentences.chinese: 对于这些关于筷子的礼仪，你知道多少呢？

sentences.chinese: 我父亲用一只筷子戳刺面包的顶部

sentences.english: I put down my chopstick, the half eaten pork chop left cold on the plate.
sentences.chinese: 我放下我的筷子，被我吃了一半的排骨躺在盘子上变凉了。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two thin sticks that you use to eat food in many countries in Asia

sentences.english: some toys for the baby
sentences.chinese: 宝宝玩的一些玩具

sentences.english: Annie was playing happily with her toys .
sentences.chinese: 安妮正高兴地玩着玩具。

detailed_translations.english: an object for children to play with

detailed_translations.chinese: 玩弄；调情；随随便便地对待

sentences.english: video production
sentences.chinese: 录像制作

sentences.english: video materials for language teaching
sentences.chinese: 语言教学的影像素材

detailed_translations.english: relating to or used in the process of recording and showing pictures on television
a copy of a film or television programme, or a series of events, recorded on videotape

sentences.chinese: 然后她问我是否可以把它悬挂起来设计成一款视频游戏。

sentences.chinese: 我们在那做了一个交易，他表现的像在教堂一样--我带他去百视达然后让他自己选一部电影或者一个电视游戏。

sentences.english: Or when users watch the trailer for an upcoming video game, they want to know when it will be released and where they can buy it.
sentences.chinese: 又或者当用户在观看一个将要上市的视频游戏的预告片时，他们想知道该游戏的发布时间以及到哪里购买。

detailed_translations.english: a computer game in which you move images on a screen using electronic controls

sentences.english: The earrings were a gift from my aunt.
sentences.chinese: 这副耳环是我姑姑送给我的礼物。

sentences.chinese: 这个钟表是他退休离开警局时收到的礼物。

sentences.chinese: 昂贵的结婚礼物

sentences.chinese: 购物满20美元奉送礼品一份。

sentences.english: This excellent cookbook would make an ideal gift for anyone just going away to college.
sentences.chinese: 这本精美的烹饪书送给要离家上大学的人是很好的礼物。

detailed_translations.english: something that you give someone, for example to thank them or because you like them, especially on a special occasion

sentences.english: His strange question surprised her.
sentences.chinese: 他那奇怪的问题令她感到意外。

sentences.english: I didn’t know you two knew each other. Mind you, it doesn’t surprise me .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道你们俩认识。 尽管如此，我并不感到意外。

sentences.english: What surprised me most was that she didn’t seem to care.
sentences.chinese: 最令我感到意外的是，她好像毫不在乎。

sentences.english: The man had a look of surprise on his face.
sentences.chinese: 那人脸上一副惊讶的表情。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使诧异,使惊异,使感到意外
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel surprised
the feeling you have when something unexpected or unusual happens

sentences.english: He retired immediately after the end of the war.
sentences.chinese: 战争一结束他就退休了。

sentences.english: Those most immediately involved in the disaster will be given support.
sentences.chinese: 灾害最直接受害者将获得援助。

sentences.chinese: 知道什么正确与能够证明它正确，这之间有很大的不同。

sentences.chinese: 这两种计算机价格上没有多大的差别。

sentences.chinese: 我们之间虽然不和，但她仍旧是我的妹妹。

sentences.chinese: 她请里克喝咖啡，他接受了。

sentences.chinese: 他接受了邀请来我们家住。

sentences.english: His school reports said that he is always ready to accept a challenge (=  agree to do something difficult  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的学业报告上说他乐于接受挑战。

sentences.chinese: 请收下这份小小的礼物。

sentences.chinese: 他们给我一份工作，我接受了。

sentences.english: He readily accepted her invitation (=  accepted it quickly  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他欣然接受了她的邀请。

sentences.chinese: 东南亚的传统

sentences.english: the tradition that the eldest son inherits the property
sentences.chinese: 长子继承家产的传统

sentences.english: By tradition, it’s the bride’s parents who pay for the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 根据传统习俗，婚礼的费用由新娘的父母承担。

detailed_translations.english: a belief, custom, or way of doing something that has existed for a long time, or these beliefs, customs etc in general

sentences.english: Many countries, for example Mexico and Japan, have a lot of earthquakes.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家，例如墨西哥和日本，经常发生地震。

sentences.chinese: 她的勇气是我们大家的榜样。

sentences.chinese: 所有乘客都必须系安全带。

sentences.chinese: 天晚了，我真的必须走了。

sentences.chinese: 你必须努力工作。

sentences.english: We must all be patient.
sentences.chinese: 我们都必须耐心。

sentences.english: Must I pay now?
sentences.chinese: 我必须现在付款吗？

sentences.english: For the engine to work, the green lever must be in the ‘up’ position.
sentences.chinese: 要启动引擎，绿色操纵杆必须在“上”这一挡。

sentences.english: Accidents must be reported to the safety officer.
sentences.chinese: 出了事故必须向安全员报告。

detailed_translations.english: to have to do something because it is necessary or important, or because of a law or order

sentences.chinese: 我希望我这个月底能完成工作。

sentences.english: She earns about £350 a month (= each month ).
sentences.chinese: 她每月约挣350英镑。

sentences.english: We update the schedule at least once a month.
sentences.chinese: 我们至少每月更新一次日程表。

detailed_translations.english: one of the 12 named periods of time that a year is divided into

name: serious
trans: 认真严肃的；不开玩笑的

sentences.english: the serious problem of unemployment
sentences.chinese: 严重的失业问题

sentences.english: Luckily, the damage was not serious.
sentences.chinese: 还好，损坏不算严重。

sentences.english: Serious crimes have increased dramatically.
sentences.chinese: 重大犯罪案件大幅度增加了。

sentences.english: Oil spills pose a serious threat to marine life.
sentences.chinese: 原油泄漏对海洋生物构成了严重威胁。

sentences.english: The president was in serious trouble .
sentences.chinese: 总统遇到大麻烦了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 严肃的，严重的；认真的；庄重的；危急的
detailed_translations.english: a serious situation, problem, accident etc is extremely bad or dangerous

sentences.english: Some birds have a highly developed sense of taste.
sentences.chinese: 有些鸟的味觉很发达。

sentences.english: She has such good taste.
sentences.chinese: 她的品位很高雅。

detailed_translations.english: the sense by which you know one food from another

sentences.english: The advice in the booklet reflects the practical experience we have gained (= experience gained by actually doing something, rather than knowledge from books etc ).
sentences.chinese: 小册子中的建议反映了我们所获得的实践经验。

sentences.english: I had some experience in fashion design.
sentences.chinese: 我有一些时装设计方面的经验。

sentences.english: She was turned down on the grounds of lack of experience.
sentences.chinese: 她因缺乏经验而被拒绝。

sentences.english: The book is based on personal experience .
sentences.chinese: 本书是根据个人经历写成的。

detailed_translations.english: knowledge or skill that you gain from doing a job or activity, or the process of doing this

sentences.english: They stayed all afternoon chatting.
sentences.chinese: 他们待了整个下午聊天。

sentences.english: She stayed late to finish the report.
sentences.chinese: 为了完成报告，她工作到很晚。

detailed_translations.english: to remain in a place rather than leave
a limited time of living in a place

sentences.english: What would you do if someone tried to rob you in the street?
sentences.chinese: 要是有人在街上抢劫你，你会怎么办？

sentences.english: Will someone please explain what’s going on?
sentences.chinese: 谁能说说是怎么回事？

sentences.english: Have Brooks or someone fax this to New York right away.
sentences.chinese: 叫布鲁克斯或谁立刻把这个发传真到纽约。

detailed_translations.english: used to mean a person, when you do not know or do not say who the person is

sentences.english: Just this week, we announced that for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 就在本周，我们首次宣布了那一政策。

sentences.english: Carefully split the sponge ring, then sandwich the two halves together with whipped cream.
sentences.chinese: 小心地切开海绵蛋糕圈，然后在两半中间夹上生奶油。

detailed_translations.chinese: 夹入；挤进；把做成三明治
detailed_translations.english: If you sandwich two things together with something else, you put that other thing between them. If you sandwich one thing between two other things, you put it between them.
two pieces of bread with cheese, meat, cooked egg etc between them

sentences.english: the age of the silicon chip
sentences.chinese: 芯片时代

sentences.english: chip technology
sentences.chinese: 芯片技术

detailed_translations.chinese: 屑片， 碎片； 炸土豆条； 集成电路片， 集成块； 缺口， 瑕疵
detailed_translations.english: a small piece of  silicon  that has a set of complicated electrical connections on it and is used to store and  process  information in computers

sentences.english: Get some fish and chips on your way home.
sentences.chinese: 回家路上顺道买些炸鱼加薯条。

sentences.english: a fish and chip shop
sentences.chinese: 炸鱼薯条店

detailed_translations.english: a meal consisting of fish covered with  batter (= a mixture of flour and milk )  and cooked in oil, served with long thin pieces of potato also cooked in oil

sentences.english: She watched him walk onto the platform.
sentences.chinese: 她看着他走上站台。

sentences.english: Don’t jump onto (= into ) the bus while it’s moving.
sentences.chinese: 别在公共汽车开动时跳上车。

sentences.english: Pour the syrup on to the egg mixture.
sentences.chinese: 把糖浆倒进鸡蛋混合料中。

sentences.english: The car rolled over onto its side.
sentences.chinese: 这辆汽车侧翻过来了。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that someone or something moves to a position on a surface, area, or object

sentences.english: Could you serve this gentleman please, Miss Bath?
sentences.chinese: 巴思小姐，请你接待一下这位先生好吗？

sentences.english: Good morning, ladies and gentlemen .
sentences.chinese: 早上好，女士们，先生们。

sentences.english: An elderly gentleman was asleep next to the fire.
sentences.chinese: 一位老先生在火炉旁边睡着了。

detailed_translations.english: a polite word for a man, used especially when talking to or about a man you do not know

sentences.english: The residents are being asked to shoulder the costs of the repairs.
sentences.chinese: 居民们被要求承担这笔修理费用。

sentences.english: They shouldered the boat and took it down to the river.
sentences.chinese: 他们把船扛在肩上抬到河里。

detailed_translations.english: to accept a difficult or unpleasant responsibility, duty etc

sentences.english: Mind the broken glass.
sentences.chinese: 当心碎玻璃。

sentences.english: a badly broken leg
sentences.chinese: 严重骨折的腿

sentences.english: Gibbs had an X-ray, which revealed no broken bones.
sentences.chinese: 吉布斯拍了X光片，显示没有骨折。

detailed_translations.english: in small pieces because it has been hit, dropped etc

sentences.english: a glass bowl
sentences.chinese: 玻璃碗

sentences.english: a piece of broken glass
sentences.chinese: 一块碎玻璃片

sentences.english: the cathedral’s stained glass windows
sentences.chinese: 教堂的彩色玻璃窗

sentences.english: Nigel raised his glass in a toast to his son.
sentences.chinese: 奈杰尔举杯向儿子祝酒。

detailed_translations.english: a transparent solid substance used for making windows, bottles etc

sentences.english: The  boy thumped down the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 小男孩咚咚地跑下楼梯。

sentences.english: The suitcase bounced down the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 衣箱一路颠跳着滚下楼梯。

sentences.english: The children pattered down the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们啪嗒啪嗒地跑下楼梯。

sentences.english: He was breathing only with the aid of a ventilator.
sentences.chinese: 他只有靠呼吸器呼吸。

sentences.english: first aid
sentences.chinese: 急救；急救护理

detailed_translations.english: help that you need to do a particular thing

sentences.english: Being given first aid at the scene of the accident probably saved his life.
sentences.chinese: 他在事故现场得到急救，这可能救了他的命。

detailed_translations.english: simple medical treatment that is given as soon as possible to someone who is injured or who suddenly becomes ill

sentences.english: medical research
sentences.chinese: 医学研究

sentences.english: medical staff
sentences.chinese: 医务人员

sentences.english: a medical student
sentences.chinese: 医科学生

sentences.english: a patient’s medical history
sentences.chinese: 患者的病史

sentences.english: medical or surgical treatment
sentences.chinese: 内科或外科疗法

detailed_translations.english: relating to medicine and the treatment of disease or injury

sentences.english: Imagine that you have just won a million pounds.
sentences.chinese: 设想你刚刚赢得一百万英镑。

sentences.english: He didn’t quite dare to imagine himself as a real artist.
sentences.chinese: 他不太敢把自己想象成一个真正的艺术家。

detailed_translations.english: to form a picture or idea in your mind about what something could be like

sentences.english: Can you hold the bottom of the ladder for me?
sentences.chinese: 你帮我扶住梯子底部好吗？

detailed_translations.english: the lowest part of something

sentences.english: You can name each window, and you can place a status bar at the bottom of each window to differentiate one from another.
sentences.chinese: 可以给每个窗口指定名称，还可以在每个窗口的底部显示一个状态栏以帮助区分窗口。

sentences.english: My wife found this at the bottom of the measure you borrowed yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 我老婆在你昨天晚上借走的称底盘上发现了这个。

sentences.english: You’ve spelt my name wrong.
sentences.chinese: 你把我的名字拼错了。

sentences.english: What? Have I done it wrong ?
sentences.chinese: 什么？我做得不对吗？

sentences.english: I asked him to sort those files, but he’s done it all wrong (= in completely the wrong way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我让他整理这些文件，可是他弄得根本不对。

sentences.english: I must have added it up wrong, then.
sentences.chinese: 那我一定是加错了。

sentences.english: It looks like it's spelled wrong.
sentences.chinese: 看起来像是拼错了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误地；邪恶地，不正当地
detailed_translations.english: not in the correct way
behaviour that is not morally right

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误的；失常的；不适当的
detailed_translations.english: not correct, and not based on true facts
Wrong is also an adverb

sentences.english: Recent stock market losses point to trouble ahead.
sentences.chinese: 最近股市的下跌预示着未来将有麻烦。

detailed_translations.english: problems or difficulties
to say something or ask someone to do something which may use or waste their time or upset them

sentences.english: Sophie lifted the phone before the second ring.
sentences.chinese: 铃响了一下苏菲就接起了电话。

sentences.english: He lifted the lid on the pot of soup.
sentences.chinese: 他揭开汤锅的盖子。

sentences.english: The lumber was lifted by crane and dropped into the truck.
sentences.chinese: 木材由起重机搬运到卡车上。

sentences.english: They took the lift down to the bar.
sentences.chinese: 他们乘电梯去楼下的酒吧。

sentences.english: It’s on the 3rd floor. Let’s use the lift.
sentences.chinese: 在三楼，我们乘电梯上去吧。

detailed_translations.english: to move something or someone upwards into the air
a machine that you can ride in, that moves up and down between the floors in a tall building

sentences.english: the harmful effects of smoking
sentences.chinese: 吸烟的害处

detailed_translations.english: causing harm

sentences.english: Your button has dropped off.
sentences.chinese: 你的纽扣掉了。

sentences.english: The number of deaths on the roads has dropped sharply.
sentences.chinese: 交通事故死亡人数已大大减少。

detailed_translations.english: to fall suddenly onto the ground or into something

sentences.english: Police drivers have to undergo intensive training .
sentences.chinese: 警察驾驶员都得接受强化训练。

sentences.english: a rigorous training session
sentences.chinese: 一节严格的训练课

sentences.english: On-the-job training will be supplemented by classroom lectures.
sentences.chinese: 除了在职培训，还将有课堂授课作为补充。

sentences.english: The shop opens late on Fridays because of staff training .
sentences.chinese: 因为员工培训，这家商店周五较晚开门营业。

detailed_translations.english: the process of teaching or being taught the skills for a particular job or activity

sentences.english: I make sure they work well.
sentences.chinese: 我要确认他们做得很好。

sentences.english: And you have to make sure, what I always say.
sentences.chinese: 所以我经常说，你要确保良好的工作环境。

sentences.english: Then, make sure that you and your spouse share these goals with each other.
sentences.chinese: 尽可能具体地说，就是确保你和你的配偶彼此共享这些目标。

sentences.english: I’d just returned from covering the Cambodian war.
sentences.chinese: 我刚报道完柬埔寨战争回来。

detailed_translations.english: to report the details of an event for a newspaper or a television or radio programme

sentences.english: An earthquake measuring 6.1 on the Richter scale struck southern California on June 28.
sentences.chinese: 6月28日加州南部地区发生了里氏6.1级地震。

sentences.english: The city is in an earthquake zone.
sentences.chinese: 该市位于地震带。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden shaking of the earth’s surface that often causes a lot of damage

sentences.english: ‘Be careful, the rocks are slippery,’ Alex warned.
sentences.chinese: “小心，岩石很滑。”亚历克斯提醒说。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that something bad or dangerous may happen, so that they can avoid it or prevent it

sentences.english: He concealed the key inside his tie.
sentences.chinese: 他把钥匙藏在领带里面。

sentences.english: The door had been locked from the inside.
sentences.chinese: 门从里面锁上了。

detailed_translations.english: in or into a container or other closed space so as to be completely covered or surrounded
the inner part of something, which is surrounded or hidden by the outer part

sentences.english: These toys are not suitable for children under five.
sentences.chinese: 这些玩具不适合五岁以下的儿童玩。

sentences.english: Most of the events listed cost under £60.
sentences.chinese: 所列活动项目的花费大多低于 60 英镑。

sentences.english: I spend just under four hours a day seeing customers.
sentences.chinese: 我一天接待客户所花的时间将近四小时。

sentences.english: He took a deep breath before he went under.
sentences.chinese: 他在钻下水前深深地吸了口气。

detailed_translations.english: less than a particular number, amount, age, or price
Under is also an adverb

sentences.english: They climbed out through the window.
sentences.chinese: 他们从窗户爬出来。

sentences.english: Boost me up so I can look in the window.
sentences.chinese: 把我向上抬起，这样我能朝窗户里面看。

sentences.english: They deducted the cost of the broken window from his allowance.
sentences.chinese: 他们从他的津贴中扣除损坏窗户的费用。

detailed_translations.english: a space or an area of glass in the wall of a building or vehicle that lets in light

sentences.english: The noise kept him awake.
sentences.chinese: 噪音使他一直醒着。

sentences.english: I was struggling to keep awake.
sentences.chinese: 我努力不让自己睡着。

detailed_translations.english: to stay in a particular state, condition, or position, or to make someone or something do this

name: clear
trans: 不和⋯⋯接触的；不挨⋯⋯太近的

sentences.english: clear instructions
sentences.chinese: 明确的指示

sentences.english: The question wasn’t very clear.
sentences.chinese: 这问题不是很清楚。

sentences.english: It’s the clearest guide I’ve used.
sentences.chinese: 我从没用过这么清晰易懂的指南。

sentences.english: Perhaps I tried to cover too much and didn’t make myself clear (= express myself well ) .
sentences.chinese: 可能是我涉及的内容太多，没有表达清楚。

sentences.english: If you don’t understand, it’s best to say so and get things clear .
sentences.chinese: 如果你不明白，那就最好照直说并把事情弄清楚。

sentences.english: If I catch you smoking again, you’re grounded. Do I make myself clear (= used when you are angry ) ?
sentences.chinese: 如果再让我发现你抽烟，我就罚你不准出门。我的话你听清楚了吗？

sentences.english: Snowplows have been out clearing the roads.
sentences.chinese: 扫雪机已经出动，去清扫路面了。

detailed_translations.english: expressed in a simple and direct way so that people understand
to make somewhere emptier or tidier by removing things from it

sentences.english: Glen was calm and composed at the funeral.
sentences.chinese: 格伦在葬礼上表现得平静而镇定。

detailed_translations.english: relaxed and quiet, not angry, nervous, or upset
to become quiet and relaxed after you have been angry, excited, nervous, or upset, or to make someone become quiet and relaxed
a situation or time that is quiet and peaceful

sentences.english: brave soldiers
sentences.chinese: 勇敢的士兵

sentences.english: her brave fight against cancer
sentences.chinese: 她与癌症的勇敢搏斗

detailed_translations.english: dealing with danger, pain, or difficult situations with courage and confidence
to deal with a difficult, dangerous, or unpleasant situation
a young fighting man from a Native American tribe

sentences.english: Thank you for your advice; it’s been very helpful.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你的建议，它非常有用。

sentences.english: It is helpful if we address a few key questions here.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们在这里解决一些关键问题会很有用的。

detailed_translations.english: providing useful help in making a situation better or easier

sentences.english: It is not within my power (= I am unable or not in a position) to help you.
sentences.chinese: 我是爱莫能助啊。

sentences.english: The ship was helpless against the power of the storm.
sentences.chinese: 那艘船只能任凭强大的暴风雨肆虐。

sentences.english: The Secretary of State has the power to approve the proposals.
sentences.chinese: 国务卿有权批准这些提议。

sentences.english: 4 to the power of 3 is 4^3 (= 4 × 4 × 4 = 64).
sentences.chinese: 4的3次方是4^3。

detailed_translations.english: the ability or right to control people or events
